biocontainers.name: peptimapper
biocontainers.summary: Also called ectoline, peptimapper is composed of a subset of pepline (2.0.1), ad redistribution of pepnovo+ (3.1 beta) and glue scripts to run a pepline/ectoline analysis.

biotools.summary: Proteogenomics workflow for the expert annotation of eukaryotic genomes.

bioschemas.name: Peptimapper
bioschemas.summary: Proteogenomics workflow for the expert annotation of eukaryotic genomes.
